outputs.output_descr: The initiation Plan will build and identify synergies with UNDP and non-UNDP Social Cohesion and citizen security initiatives being implemented in the Caribbean region. This action will be instrumental in assisting the starting up of the newly-decided initiative of developing a regional Human Development Report (HDR) for the Caribbean region. Elaboration of a project document. Root causes of polarisation, which leads to insufficient social cohesion, and its effect on national and regional development identified in selected countries and used as inputs to the RHDR. Regional Human Development Report drafted, produced and disseminated.
outputs.output_title: IP for Citizen Security for th

project_title: IP for Citizen Security for the Caribbean
